description: The AWS::AppRunner::VpcIngressConnection resource is an App Runner resource that specifies an App Runner VpcIngressConnection.

IngressVpcConfiguration.description: The configuration of customer’s VPC and related VPC endpoint

VpcId.description: The ID of the VPC that the VPC endpoint is used in.
VpcId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the VPC that the VPC endpoint is used in.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

VpcEndpointId.description: The ID of the VPC endpoint that your App Runner service connects to.
VpcEndpointId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the VPC endpoint that your App Runner service connects to.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

IngressVpcConfiguration.markdownDescription:
The configuration of customer’s VPC and related VPC endpoint

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

VpcIngressConnectionName.description: The customer-provided Vpc Ingress Connection name.
VpcIngressConnectionName.markdownDescription:
The customer-provided Vpc Ingress Connection name.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 4  
Maximum Length: 40  
Pattern: [A-Za-z0-9][A-Za-z0-9\-_]{3,39}  
Update requires: Replacement

ServiceArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the service.
ServiceArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the service.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1011  
Pattern: arn:aws(-[\w]+)*:[a-z0-9-\.]{0,63}:[a-z0-9-\.]{0,63}:[0-9]{12}:(\w|/|-){1,1011}  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: Replacement

VpcIngressConnectionArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the VpcIngressConnection.
VpcIngressConnectionArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the VpcIngressConnection.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1011  
Pattern: arn:aws(-[\w]+)*:[a-z0-9-\.]{0,63}:[a-z0-9-\.]{0,63}:[0-9]{12}:(\w|/|-){1,1011}  
Update requires: No interruption

Status.description: The current status of the VpcIngressConnection.
Status.markdownDescription:
The current status of the VpcIngressConnection.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: AVAILABLE | PENDING_CREATION | PENDING_UPDATE | PENDING_DELETION | FAILED_CREATION | FAILED_UPDATE | FAILED_DELETION | DELETED  
Update requires: No interruption

DomainName.description: The Domain name associated with the VPC Ingress Connection.
DomainName.markdownDescription:
The Domain name associated with the VPC Ingress Connection.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: [A-Za-z0-9*.-]{1,255}  
Update requires: No interruption
